effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.

short_effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user’s Speed stat.
